Declare.origin: [ declaring who shall then act as President " U.S. Constitution amend. XX"]

1.definition: to make known formally, officially, or explicitly [who shall then act as President "amend. XX"]

2 a.definition: to make a full statement of (one's taxable property) [didn't some of his income]

sub_terms.b: to state the value of (one's taxable or dutiable property) [the diamond earrings]
